settings.//maxDistance: Maximum distance from where Blocks and Entities can be picked up
settings.//maxEntityWidth: Max width of entities that can be picked up in survival mode
settings.//maxEntityHeight: Max height of entities that can be picked up in survival mode
settings.//heavyTiles: More complex Tile Entities slow down the player more
settings.//pickupAllBlocks: Allow all blocks to be picked up, not just Tile Entites. White/Blacklist will still be respected.
settings.//slownessInCreative: Whether Blocks and Entities slow the creative player down when carried
settings.//pickupHostileMobs: Whether hostile mobs should be able to picked up in survival mode
settings.//heavyEntities: Larger Entities slow down the player more
settings.//allowBabies: Allow babies to be carried even when adult mob is blacklisted (or not whitelisted)
settings.//useWhitelistBlocks: Use Whitelist instead of Blacklist for Blocks
settings.//useWhitelistEntities: Use Whitelist instead of Blacklist for Entities
settings.//useWhitelistStacking: Use Whitelist instead of Blacklist for Stacking
settings.//hitWhileCarrying: Whether the player can hit blocks and entities while carrying or not
settings.//dropCarriedWhenHit: Whether the player drops the carried object when hit or not
settings.//useScripts: Use custom Pickup Scripts. Having this set to false, will not allow you to run scripts, but will increase your performance
settings.//stackableEntities: Allows entities to be stacked on top of each other
settings.//entitySizeMattersStacking: Whether entities' size matters when stacking or not. This means that larger entities cannot be stacked on smaller ones
settings.//placementStateExceptions: Usually all the block state information is retained when placing a block that was picked up. But some information is changed to a modified property, like rotation or orientation. In this list, add additional properties that should NOT be saved and instead be updated when placed. Format: modid:block[propertyname]. Note: You don't need to add an entry for every subtype of a same block. For example, we only add an entry for one type of slab, but the change is applied to all slabs.
settings.//pickupPlayers: Whether Players can be picked up. Creative players can't be picked up in Survival Mode

whitelist.//whitelist: Whitelist. Read about the format here: https://github.com/Tschipp/CarryOn/wiki/Black---and-Whitelist-Config
whitelist.//allowedEntities: Entities that CAN be picked up (useWhitelistEntities must be true)
whitelist.//allowedBlocks: Blocks that CAN be picked up (useWhitelistBlocks must be true)
whitelist.//allowedStacking: Entities that CAN have other entities stacked on top of them (useWhitelistStacking must be true)

blacklist.//blacklist: Blacklist. Read about the format here: https://github.com/Tschipp/CarryOn/wiki/Black---and-Whitelist-Config
blacklist.//forbiddenTiles: Blocks that cannot be picked up
blacklist.//forbiddenEntities: Entities that cannot be picked up
blacklist.//forbiddenStacking: Entities that cannot have other entities stacked on top of them

customPickupConditions.//customPickupConditions: Custom Pickup Conditions. Read about the format here: https://github.com/Tschipp/CarryOn/wiki/Custom-Pickup-Condition-Config
